title: Mark Cache: The ClickHouse Speed Hack You’re Not Using (Yet)
author: Anil Inamdar
description: With just a few adjustments and regular monitoring, mark cache can unlock major performance improvements with minimal effort.
cntitle: Mark Cache：你还没用上的 ClickHouse 速度秘诀
cndescription: 只需稍作调整和定期监控，mark cache 就可以在极小的代价下显著提升性能。
